name: Poly Bridge 3D
description:
This prototype was made for the "Mix and Game Jam".

I knew very early I wouldn't be able to finish in time but I liked the idea so I just went with it.

Here's what I've got so far:

  • The building mechanics are working (joints, connections, roads, support for different materials) but need some polish
  • Restoring a bridge after simulating does not work yet
  • The car AI is a pile of garbage (thats why I didnt include it in the build ;D )
  • There is only one level and no kind of progression.

I am planning on continuing this project, however I don't want to promise anything since its just a fun side-project.

Controls:

  • WASD to move the camera
  • MMB to rotate the camera
  • MouseWheel to change the current height
  • Drag any point to extrude it
  • LShift + Drag to move existing points
  • LCtrl + LMB to delete points
  • The button enables physics (cannot be undone)
